page.title: 15HOW FOXTON HEARS THE NEWS
page.content: Newspapers,Television,Video,Telephones and Radio are all to be found in most of our houses today. The 2 Local papers are the Leicester Mercury and the Harborough Mail. National Daily papers include the Telegraph,Guardian,Mail,Mirror,Star, Sun,Express and Times. We have 4 T.V.channels B.B.C.1,B.B.C.2 I.T.V. and Channel 4.on our T.V.sets and we can receive local regional variations on programmes. British Telecom run various phone in news services keeping you up to date with such things as Weather,Roadworks,Sport results etc. As you can see we are very well informed if we want to be
